item.description: So since tonight was such a blast I'm posting up another meet up at the same place same time for next Thursday! This is a week in advance so maybe more of you can come! Hope to sing and dance with you all! =) Tisane on Farmington Ave in Hartford (near the Half Door) only this time I'm making it for 10:30 cause that's when karaoke really starts. Please feel free to go earlier if you want dinner their food is ammaaahzing!!! ;) I have a work event to attend beforehand that's why I'm making the event for later.
item.name: More Karaoke!! YAY!! =D
